title: Boundaries of the heart
creator_credit: Lex Marinos, Patric Juillet, FGH Film Consortium and Tra La La Films
brief_description: Depicts life in an outback Australian town, centring on a small town belle who has become bitter and stilted. She is alienating her family friends and shearer boyfriend and after many humiliations, she faces a bleak and lonely future. Stars Wendy Hughes, John Hargreaves and Norman Kaye.
